word: We went out to view the land purchased for sanitarium and college site. The stream of pure water running through the whole length of our purchased land is clear as crystal and grateful to the taste. I am in no wise disappointed. . . . Here, then, was the favorable location for our buildings, near the settlements of people who have made their homes in the country.--Ms 141, 1904. (Diary, April 24, 1904.)
